name: Dream Bubblez
description:
Seeing a bubble in your dreams signifies relaxation, peace and good fortune. A bubble has no noise till it exists and thus, it also indicates silence.

Your task is easy, find in a growing number of bubbles the biggest and burst it by tapping!

Soft and wonderful animations in conjunction with a soothing soundscape will free your mind from the stress of everyday life.

Download "Dream Bubblez" and go on a unique journey where you will relax, meditate, and even dream!

• Simple one finger control

• Play forever and try to beat your friend's top score with Game Center!

• Unlock up to 10 color schemes
